reviews.review: 当时打折7块钱买的，第一次玩的时候晕头转向的差点玩恶心了，后来适应了感觉非常棒的游戏，唯一比较坑的是开始没有字幕，语音也全是英文的，等我打通关了，大概剧情内容都是猜出来的，我才发现能改中文字幕……

이게임, 명작이다. 정가에 사도 상관은 없지만, 할인 자주한다. 할인기간에 '번들' 로 사는것을 추천한다.

updated review: glados in co-op is balanced

One of the most incredible, engaging, hilarious, and creative video games I have ever played. I never thought a game like this could exist, but it does and its amazing.

Every aspect of Portal 2 is made with genuine quality and care. The story, writing, music, graphics, voice acting and humor are all astounding, even after 8 years have passed. Combined with a co-op mode and the Steam Workshop that allows players to create custom test chambers, Portal 2 becomes an absolute masterpiece.

What stands out the most for the game is its brilliant level design and gameplay. The learning curve for this game is exceptional, starting out with learning the basics established in Portal 1 and then introducing new gameplay elements that mix masterfully into how you learn the environment around you. Each level I felt like I was tested to find new solutions to challenging situations, and the atmosphere kept me connecting to the overarching story that I was experiencing. 

What an amazing game. At the end I was left both happy in what I had accomplished and sad that it was over. An experience like Portal 2 is simply unforgettable.

10/10

I can't believe I've never played Portal 1 or 2 before now...especially having been a fan of half life for years. The graphics are still fantastic in 2019. I've not played a really good game for ages and this has really blown me away. I bought the bundle of both games and completed them both in about 12 hours. If you have never played this then just buy it now.

Excellent story to unfold, hidden meaning, easter eggs, puzzles. I found my mind blown by some of the gameplay when you first get into it.

Oyunu ilk aldığınızda eğer hiç oynamadıysanız birazcık portal açma konusunda sıkıntı yaşayabilirsiniz. Fakat kısa süre sonra oyunun mantığını öğreneceksiniz ve oyun daha da zevkli hale gelecek. 

Oyuna ilk girdiğimde portal da kendimi (oyundaki karakteri) görmüştüm ve bu konuda şaka yapmıyorum acayip korkmuştum :))

Fakat daha sonra oyuna alıştığınız vakit çıkmak istemeyeceğiniz bir oyun haline geliyor durmadan portal açıp bir yerlerden bir yerlere gitmek ve bunları yaparken zekanızı, mantığınızı kullanmak insanı gayet eğlendiriyor.

Ben bu oyunu oynarken çok eğlendim kesinlikle alacak arkadaşlara tavsiye ederim.
Még több tesztelés... a co-op iszonyat jó :D
